name: The Drop (4k3n0)
description:
Description

Hardcore top-down platformer about a tiny droplet trying to escape the deep cave. 

Absorbing water droplets, while sponges trying to absorb you back!

Game was made in 3 days for ScoreSpace Jam #20 🕹️

Features:
  •  Online Leaderboard powered by LootLocker
  •  2 Biomes 
  •  Several game mechanics : stones, absorbing moss
Team
